items.title: 苹果新款 iPhone 17 配件亮橙色泄露 (原标题: Apple's New iPhone 17 Accessory Leaked in Vibrant Orange Color)
items.creator: Tim Hardwick
items.summary:
# 苹果 iPhone 17 新配件泄露：亮橙色斜挎带

根据最新传闻和泄露图片，苹果即将为 iPhone 17 系列推出一款全新的官方配件——一款亮橙色的斜挎带。该配件的样品已在苹果“Awe dropping”发布会前曝光。

## 主要信息点

*   **配件类型与颜色**：
    *   这是一款专为 iPhone 17 设计的斜挎带（crossbody strap）。
    *   泄露的样品呈现出鲜艳的橙色。

*   **泄露来源**：
    *   知名爆料人 Sonny Dickson 分享了这款斜挎带的图片。
    *   ![橙色 iPhone 17 斜挎带](https://images.macrumors.com/t/gXSswTRR_CIETdWJv-ZXoZwZA3M=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/orange-iphone-17-crossbody-strap-dickson.jpg?lossy)

*   **兼容性与设计**：
    *   该斜挎带将与苹果即将推出的 **TechWoven 保护壳**配合使用，TechWoven 系列将取代已停产的 FineWoven 系列。
    *   斜挎带内部包含柔性金属芯，并采用磁性连接点，方便用户轻松连接和拆卸。
    *   新款 TechWoven 保护壳的底部角落将设有专门的附件孔，用于固定斜挎带。
    *   该配件本身沿其整个长度都具有磁性。

*   **与此前传闻的吻合**：
    *   此次泄露与 Majin Bu 和 DuanRui 等爆料人此前的传闻相符。
    *   早期的 CAD 图纸和保护壳克隆品也显示了官方 iPhone 17 保护壳上存在类似的附件点。

*   **苹果在可穿戴配件方面的先例**：
    *   苹果并非首次为其产品引入可穿戴配件。例如，AirPods Pro 2 充电盒带有挂绳孔，而第五代 iPod touch 也内置了类似的附件硬件。

*   **颜色暗示**：
    *   考虑到 iPhone 17 Pro 机型预计将推出新的橙色，这款亮橙色斜挎带的出现可能是在暗示或呼应这一新的产品颜色。
items.shortSummary: 苹果新款 iPhone 17 的官方配件——一款亮橙色斜挎带已在发布会前泄露。该配件由爆料人 Sonny Dickson 曝光，旨在搭配 iPhone 17 的 TechWoven 保护壳使用。它采用磁性连接点和柔性金属芯，并与保护壳底部的附件孔配合。此泄露与此前传闻一致，并可能预示 iPhone 17 Pro 将推出橙色版本。该配件预计将在苹果即将举行的发布会上正式亮相。
items.translated_title: 苹果新款 iPhone 17 配件亮橙色泄露
items.content:
Several recent rumors have pointed to an all-new official Apple accessory arriving with the iPhone 17 lineup, and it looks like samples of the product have leaked ahead of Apple’s “Awe dropping” event on Tuesday.


Apple will offer a crossbody strap designed to work with the company's upcoming TechWoven cases for iPhone 17, and leaker Sonny Dickson has shared images of one of the straps in a vibrant orange color. The crossbody strap will reportedly have a flexible metal core and use magnetic attachment points, allowing users to easily connect and disconnect the accessory as needed.

Based on previous leaks, new TechWoven cases – replacing Apple's discontinued FineWoven line – will feature small attachment holes in the bottom corners specifically for looping through Apple's new strap. The accessory also apparently features a unique design that makes it magnetic along its entire length.

The latest leak tallies with earlier rumors from Majin Bu and fellow leaker DuanRui, who have shared CAD drawings and case clones showing similar attachment points on official iPhone 17 cases.

It won't be the first time Apple has leaned into wearable accessories for its products. The AirPods Pro 2 charging case includes a lanyard cutout, and the fifth-generation iPod touch featured built-in attachment hardware for similar purposes.

Here’s your first look at the Crossbody Strap for iPhone 17, do people actually use these? pic.twitter.com/jcJOuleRbq

— Sonny Dickson (@SonnyDickson) September 8, 2025

Apple is expected to release the iPhone 17 Pro models in a new orange color, so the strap we see here could also be alluding to it. Stay tuned for in-depth coverage of Apple's announcements this week.
Tag: Sonny Dickson

items.title: 所有iPhone 17和iPhone 17 Pro电池容量据称已泄露 (原标题: All iPhone 17 and iPhone 17 Pro Battery Capacities Allegedly Leaked)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# iPhone 17系列电池容量泄露

在苹果即将发布iPhone 17系列前夕，据称这些设备的电池容量已在中国监管数据库中浮出水面。这些数据由名为ShrimpApplePro的账户在X上分享。

## 主要发现

*   **数据来源**：中国监管数据库，由X账户ShrimpApplePro分享。
*   **泄露时间**：在苹果于2025年9月9日（星期二）发布iPhone 17系列之前。

## SIM卡槽对电池容量的影响

文章指出，部分iPhone 17型号的电池容量会因是否配备物理SIM卡槽而有所不同：

*   **型号差异**：iPhone 17 Air、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max将根据销售国家提供带或不带物理SIM卡槽的版本。
*   **容量影响**：带物理SIM卡槽的型号电池容量略低于仅支持eSIM的型号，因为SIM卡槽会占用内部空间。
*   **iPhone 17基础型号**：目前数据库中只发现一种电池容量，尚不清楚是否带SIM卡槽。
*   **SIM卡托移除趋势**：苹果计划在更多国家取消SIM卡托，但由于eSIM可用性有限或当地法规（如中国），部分国家可能仍会保留。
*   **iPhone 17 Air**：由于其超薄设计，预计在许多国家将不带物理SIM卡槽。

## 各型号电池容量（据称）

以下是据称的各型号电池容量列表：

| 型号             | 带SIM卡槽容量 | 不带SIM卡槽容量 |
| :--------------- | :------------ | :-------------- |
| iPhone 17        | 3,692 mAh\*   |                 |
| iPhone 17 Air    | 3,036 mAh     | 3,149 mAh       |
| iPhone 17 Pro    | 3,988 mAh     | 4,252 mAh       |
| iPhone 17 Pro Max | 4,823 mAh     | 5,088 mAh       |

*   \*iPhone 17的3,692 mAh容量尚不确定是带SIM卡槽还是不带SIM卡槽的版本。

## 关键亮点

*   **iPhone 17 Pro Max**：有望成为首款电池容量突破5,000 mAh的iPhone型号，达到5,088 mAh，比iPhone 16 Pro Max的电池容量增加近8%。
*   **iPhone 17 Air**：超薄的iPhone 17 Air电池容量约为3,000 mAh，相对较低。但该设备将受益于苹果高效的C1蜂窝调制解调器，且苹果计划为其发布电池保护壳。

## 验证与官方发布

*   MacRumors虽然能够访问显示在截图中的监管数据库，但尚未独立证实这些数据。
*   由于欧盟要求苹果在其iPhone产品页面上显示能源标签，官方电池容量可能在本周晚些时候公布。

![iPhone Air Battery Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/HoRd3b4e3QjR2vEKZNJ5ExCodW0=/400x0/article-new/2025/05/iPhone-Air-Battery-Feature.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 在苹果发布iPhone 17系列前夕，据称所有iPhone 17和iPhone 17 Pro型号的电池容量已从中国监管数据库泄露。数据显示，iPhone 17 Pro Max的电池容量有望首次突破5,000 mAh，达到5,088 mAh。超薄的iPhone 17 Air电池容量约为3,000 mAh。部分型号的电池容量会因是否配备物理SIM卡槽而略有不同。这些数据尚未得到独立证实，但官方信息可能很快公布。
items.translated_title: 所有iPhone 17和iPhone 17 Pro电池容量据称已泄露
items.content:
Just ahead of Apple unveiling the iPhone 17 series on Tuesday, it appears that battery capacities for the devices have surfaced in a Chinese regulatory database.


The table below lists the alleged battery capacities for each model, which were shared in a post on X today by an account known as ShrimpApplePro.

The database suggests that the iPhone 17 Air, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max will be available with and without a physical SIM card slot, depending on the country of sale. For the base model iPhone 17, however, it appears that only one battery capacity for that device has been discovered in the database so far.

It was previously rumored that Apple plans to eliminate the SIM card tray from iPhones in more countries beyond the U.S. this year, but it will likely continue to exist in some countries, due to limited eSIM availability or other reasons. For example, some iPhone 17 models might still have a SIM card slot in China, due to local regulations.

Notably, the iPhone 17 Air is the model that is most expected to lack a physical SIM card slot in many countries, due to its ultra-thin design with limited internal space.

Given the SIM card tray takes up some space inside an iPhone, the models with such a tray appear to have slightly lower battery capacities than eSIM-only variants.


























Model With SIM Card Tray Without SIM Card Tray
iPhone 17 3,692 mAh*
iPhone 17 Air 3,036 mAh 3,149 mAh
iPhone 17 Pro 3,988 mAh 4,252 mAh
iPhone 17 Pro Max 4,823 mAh 5,088 mAh


* Unclear if this capacity is for a model with or without a SIM card tray.

MacRumors has access to the regulatory database shown in the screenshot, but it has yet to independently confirm these listings.

A few takeaways based on these alleged capacities:
  • As rumored, the iPhone 17 Pro Max would become the first iPhone model to cross the 5,000 mAh battery capacity mark. With a 5,088 mAh battery, the device would have a nearly 8% larger battery compared to the iPhone 16 Pro Max.

  • Another rumor that appears to be accurate is the ultra-thin iPhone 17 Air having around a 3,000 mAh battery capacity, which is on the lower side for an iPhone. However, the device will benefit from Apple's power-efficient C1 modem for cellular connectivity, and Apple reportedly plans to release an iPhone 17 Air battery case.
Given that Apple is now required to show an energy label on its iPhone product pages in the EU, official battery capacities might be published later this week.

items.title: Apple Watch SE 3 及更多产品似乎已通过最后一刻泄露得到确认 (原标题: Apple Watch SE 3 and More Seemingly Confirmed by Last-Minute Leak)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## Apple Watch SE 3 及更多产品泄露详情

### 引言

2025年9月7日，一个在X平台拥有可靠记录的私人账户分享了关于即将发布的Apple Watch和iPad Pro型号的详细信息，进一步证实了此前的一些传闻。

### 泄露设备概览

此次泄露提及了以下几款设备：

*   **Apple Watch Series 11**：将配备基于S9和S10芯片相同架构的芯片。
*   **Apple Watch Ultra 3**：同样将配备基于S9和S10芯片相同架构的芯片。
*   **Apple Watch SE 3**：也将配备基于S9和S10芯片相同架构的芯片。
*   **四款新的iPad Pro配置**：这些iPad Pro型号将搭载M5芯片。

### 芯片架构细节

根据MacRumors贡献者Aaron Perris发现的信息，所有新款Apple Watch型号很可能都将配备S11芯片。这款S11芯片预计将与前代Apple Watch型号中的S9和S10芯片采用相似的架构。这并非没有先例，例如S6、S7和S8芯片就曾基于相同的架构。

### 预计发布时间

*   **Apple Watch型号**：上述三款Apple Watch型号预计将在9月9日（周二）苹果的“Awe Dropping”活动中揭晓。
*   **iPad Pro型号**：搭载M5芯片的iPad Pro型号则可能在10月发布。

### 泄露的意义

尽管这些设备此前已有传闻，但此次泄露提供了更多证据，表明Apple Watch Ultra 3和Apple Watch SE 3将与Apple Watch Series 11一同发布。值得注意的是，Apple Watch SE（当前型号于2022年发布）和Apple Watch Ultra 2（于2023年发布）并非每年更新，因此此次更新对于这些系列而言具有一定意义。

### 图片

![Apple Watch SE 3 模拟图](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Xvj9jgcl5sJGn2suBd7Q_0DAqk0=/400x0/article-new/2023/10/Apple-Watch-SE-3-Mock-Feature.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 一个可靠的泄露消息证实了即将发布的苹果产品。Apple Watch Series 11、Apple Watch Ultra 3和Apple Watch SE 3预计将于9月9日的苹果活动中亮相，它们将搭载基于S9/S10架构的S11芯片。此外，四款搭载M5芯片的新款iPad Pro配置预计将在10月发布。此次泄露进一步证实了这些此前已有传闻的设备，特别是对于并非每年更新的Apple Watch Ultra和SE系列。
items.translated_title: Apple Watch SE 3 及更多产品似乎已通过最后一刻泄露得到确认
items.content:
A private account on X with a proven track record today shared alleged details about upcoming Apple Watch and iPad Pro models.


Here are the alleged devices that the account mentioned:
  • Apple Watch Series 11 with a chip based on the same architecture as the S9 and S10 chips in previous Apple Watch models

  • Apple Watch Ultra 3 with a chip based on the same architecture as the S9 and S10 chips

  • Apple Watch SE 3 with a chip based on the same architecture as the S9 and S10 chips

  • Four new iPad Pro configurations with the M5 chip
All three of the Apple Watch models listed above are expected to be unveiled during Apple's so-called "Awe Dropping" event on Tuesday, September 9, while iPad Pro models with the M5 chip will likely be announced in October.

All of these devices were already rumored, but this leak serves as even more evidence that an Apple Watch Ultra 3 and Apple Watch SE 3 will be unveiled alongside the Apple Watch Series 11. Last year, the Apple Watch Series 10 was the only new model, although the Apple Watch Ultra 2 did receive a new black titanium option.

The current Apple Watch SE was released in 2022, and the Apple Watch Ultra 2 launched in 2023, so those models have not always been updated annually.

As we already reported, based on information discovered by MacRumors contributor Aaron Perris, all of the new Apple Watch models will likely be equipped with an S11 chip that is similar to the S9 and S10 chips in previous Apple Watch models. There is precedent for this, as the S6, S7, and S8 chips were all based on the same architecture.

items.title: iPhone 18 传闻在 iPhone 17 发布前两天变成了 iPhone 19 传闻 (原标题: iPhone 18 Rumor Becomes iPhone 19 Rumor Two Days Before iPhone 17)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## iPhone 摄像头传感器传闻更新：三星供应推迟至 iPhone 19

### 传闻背景与时间点

*   **发布日期**：2025年9月7日，星期日。
*   **核心内容**：关于三星为 iPhone 供应 48 兆像素超广角摄像头传感器的传闻，其预计发布时间已从 iPhone 18 推迟到 iPhone 19。
*   **发布时机**：此更新发生在苹果即将发布 iPhone 17 的两天前。

### 传闻详情

*   **最初预测 (2024年7月)**：苹果供应链分析师郭明錤曾预计，三星最早将于 2026 年开始向苹果供应 48 兆像素超广角摄像头传感器，这与部分 iPhone 18 机型的发布时间相符。
*   **最新预测 (2025年9月)**：郭明錤在本周末的后续报告中表示，他现在预计首批搭载三星传感器的 iPhone 机型将在 2027 年发布。这意味着该传闻现在适用于部分 iPhone 19 机型，而非 iPhone 18 机型。

### 技术细节与供应商

*   **芯片供应**：上个月，苹果宣布三星将为其供应在德克萨斯州制造的 iPhone 芯片。
*   **传感器类型**：据《金融时报》报道，这些芯片是三层堆叠图像传感器。这种架构通过垂直堆叠多个传感器层，实现了更高的像素密度和改进的低光性能。
*   **堆叠传感器优势**：
    *   更高的像素密度
    *   改进的低光性能
    *   更高的动态范围
    *   降低功耗

### 市场影响

*   **供应商格局变化**：长期以来，索尼一直是 iPhone 摄像头图像传感器的独家供应商。三星的加入，无论何时发生，都将是值得关注的重大变化。

![iPhone 12 Pro 传感器位移](https://images.macrumors.com/t/u7_Yj6zcow_i3nzIz-Q6FT-eoAw=/400x0/article-new/2020/10/iphone_12_pro_sensor_shift.jpg?lossy)
*图示：iPhone 12 Pro 传感器位移技术，与文章中提及的传感器技术相关。*
items.shortSummary: 苹果供应链分析师郭明錤更新预测，三星为 iPhone 供应 48 兆像素超广角摄像头传感器的计划，已从最初的 iPhone 18（2026年）推迟到 iPhone 19（2027年）。这一变化发生在 iPhone 17 发布前两天。三星将提供三层堆叠图像传感器，有望提升像素密度和低光性能，并打破索尼长期以来作为 iPhone 独家传感器供应商的局面。
items.translated_title: iPhone 18 传闻在 iPhone 17 发布前两天变成了 iPhone 19 传闻
items.content:
In July 2024, Apple supply chain analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said he expected Samsung to begin shipping 48-megapixel Ultra Wide camera sensors to Apple for iPhones as early as 2026, which is when some iPhone 18 models are expected to be released.


In a follow-up post this weekend, however, Kuo said he now expects the first iPhone models with Samsung's sensor to be released in 2027. In other words, this rumor seemingly now applies to some iPhone 19 models, instead of iPhone 18 models.

Last month, Apple announced Samsung would supply it with iPhone chips manufactured in Texas. According to the Financial Times, the chips in question are three-layer stacked image sensors, which enable higher pixel density and improved low-light performance by vertically stacking multiple sensor layers. Stacked sensor architecture has other benefits too, including higher dynamic range and reduced power consumption.

Sony has long been the exclusive supplier of image sensors for iPhone cameras, so Samsung entering the fray would be notable, whenever that may happen.

For those of you playing along at home, an iPhone 18 rumor has become an iPhone 19 rumor, two days before Apple unveils the iPhone 17. iPhone 20, anyone?
Tags: iPhone 19, Ming-Chi Kuo, Samsung

items.title: 郭明錤：AirPods Pro 3 即将推出，但更大升级将在明年到来 (原标题: Kuo: AirPods Pro 3 Coming Soon, But Bigger Upgrade Arriving Next Year)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# AirPods Pro 3 即将发布，AirPods Pro 4 明年将迎来重大升级

## AirPods Pro 3 发布时间与预期功能

*   **发布时间：** 供应链分析师郭明錤预测 AirPods Pro 3 将于今年（2025年下半年）发布，可能在9月9日的 iPhone 17 发布会上亮相。
*   **核心新功能：** 彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）报告称，AirPods Pro 3 很可能具备心率监测功能，类似于今年早些时候 Powerbeats Pro 2 引入的功能，并配备更小的充电盒。
    *   **心率监测原理：** 通过 LED 光学传感器每秒脉冲超过100次，测量血流以获取心率数据。该功能基于 Apple Watch 的心率传感技术。
    *   **数据整合：** 该功能可与流行的健身应用集成，收集运动数据并同步到 iPhone 上的 Apple 健康应用。
    *   **优先级：** 如果同时佩戴 AirPods Pro 3 和 Apple Watch，应用将默认使用 Apple Watch 的心率数据。
*   **其他潜在改进：** 预计还将包括音质提升、主动降噪增强以及设计上的改变。
*   **发布间隔：** AirPods Pro 2 于2022年9月发布（2023年9月更新了 USB-C 充电盒），这意味着 AirPods Pro 3 与前代之间至少有三年的间隔。

![AirPods Pro 3 Heart Rate Tracking Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/BA5ePABu00wOc9SnEzcWGwxitaU=/400x0/article-new/2024/12/AirPods-Pro-3-Heart-Rate-Tracking-Feature.jpg?lossy)

## AirPods Pro 4：明年的重大硬件升级

*   **发布计划：** 郭明錤表示，苹果计划在明年再次更新 AirPods Pro，带来“更显著”的硬件升级。
*   **关键新功能：** 至少包含一个微型红外摄像头。
*   **红外摄像头潜在用途：**
    *   识别手势。
    *   增强与 Apple Vision Pro 头显配合使用的空间音频体验。例如，用户在使用 Vision Pro 观看视频时，如果头部转向特定方向，该方向的声源可以被强调，从而提升空间音频/计算体验。
*   **展望：** 尽管 AirPods Pro 4 的计划听起来雄心勃勃，但其最终实现仍有待观察。
items.shortSummary: 供应链分析师郭明錤预测，AirPods Pro 3 将于今年（2025年下半年）发布，可能在 iPhone 17 发布会上亮相。预计新一代 AirPods Pro 将引入心率监测功能、更小的充电盒，并提升音质和主动降噪。更值得关注的是，郭明錤透露苹果计划在明年推出 AirPods Pro 4，这将是一次“更显著”的硬件升级，可能集成微型红外摄像头，用于手势识别和增强与 Apple Vision Pro 配合使用的空间音频体验。
items.translated_title: 郭明錤：AirPods Pro 3 即将推出，但更大升级将在明年到来

images.alt: AirPods Pro 3 Heart Rate Tracking Feature

items.content:
Apple plans to release AirPods Pro 3 this year, according to supply chain analyst Ming-Chi Kuo.


All signs point towards Apple unveiling the AirPods Pro 3 during its iPhone 17 event on Tuesday, September 9. However, Kuo did not provide a specific timeframe beyond the second half of 2025, which lines up with previous rumors.

Kuo did not mention any new features that are planned for the AirPods Pro 3. However, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman recently reported that the AirPods Pro 3 will likely have the same heart rate monitoring feature that Apple introduced on the Powerbeats Pro 2 earlier this year, along with a significantly smaller charging case.

When both Powerbeats Pro 2 earbuds are placed in the ears, and heart rate monitoring is active, Apple says LED optical sensors pulse at over 100 times per second to measure heart rate via blood flow. The feature integrates with popular fitness apps to collect data during workouts and sync it to Apple's Health app on the iPhone.

The feature is based on the Apple Watch's heart rate sensing technology. If someone is wearing both Powerbeats Pro 2 and an Apple Watch, Apple says apps default to using Apple Watch heart rate data, and that will likely apply to the AirPods Pro 3 too.

Beyond heart rate monitoring, it is likely that the next AirPods Pro will feature improved sound quality, increased active noise cancellation, design changes, and more.

AirPods Pro 2 debuted at the iPhone 14 event in September 2022, and they were updated with a USB-C charging case and a few other tweaks in September 2023.

While there will have been at least a three-year gap between the launches of the AirPods Pro 2 and the AirPods Pro 3, the wait for AirPods Pro 4 might be significantly shorter. Kuo said that Apple plans to update the AirPods Pro again next year, with a "more significant" hardware upgrade: at least one tiny infrared camera.

Kuo previously said AirPods with infrared cameras could recognize hand gestures, and provide an enhanced spatial audio experience with Apple's Vision Pro headset.

"For example, when a user is watching a video with Vision Pro and wearing this new AirPods, if users turn their heads to look in a specific direction, the sound source in that direction can be emphasized to enhance the spatial audio/computing experience," he said.

AirPods Pro 4 next year sounds quite ambitious, though, so we will see if that actually happens.

Apple is hosting an online streaming event for the public and press on Tuesday, September 9, 2024 at 10:00 a.m. Pacific Time. The company is expected to announce its new iPhone 17 lineup alongside new Apple Watch models, and potentially other products during the event, dubbed "Awe Dropping." Here's how you can watch it and when, wherever you are in the world.


There are multiple ways to watch the September 9 event, with details listed below. We've also included a useful guide on when the event will take place in your particular time zone.

Apple Events Website


With the Apple Events website, you can watch the event live on a Mac, iPhone, ‌iPad‌, PC, or any other device with a web browser. The Apple Events website works in Safari, Chrome, Firefox, and other main browsers.


Just navigate to www.apple.com/apple-events/ using a web browser at the appropriate time to watch. You can visit the site now to add an event reminder to your calendar.

YouTube


Apple also plans to stream the event live on YouTube, which is perhaps the easiest and most efficient way to watch because the YouTube live stream can be viewed on every platform where YouTube is available, which is pretty much all platforms, from smartphones and tablets to consoles and smart TVs.


Apple has posted a placeholder for the September 9 event on YouTube, and you can visit it now to set an event reminder.

Apple TV App


Apple used to have a dedicated Apple Events app on the Apple TV, but ahead of WWDC 2020, it was folded into the Apple TV app. On event day, there will be a prominent ‌Apple TV‌ app section dedicated to the live stream, which can be watched on any device where the ‌Apple TV‌ app is available.


This includes the ‌Apple TV‌, iPhones, iPads, and Macs, as well as select smart TVs, streaming devices, and gaming consoles. If you have an ‌Apple TV‌, the ‌Apple TV‌ app is one of the best ways to watch the event live. Apple hasn't updated the ‌Apple TV‌ app with the new event as of yet, but it should be added soon.
